definition: to take possession of/to occupy/to take up
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)

sentences.english: Terminal 3 of the airport is the single largest building, by floor space.
sentences.chinese: 机场的3号航站楼按占地面积来说是最大的独立建筑。

sentences.english: Johnson built the 47-acre estate for himself in New Canaan, Connecticut.
sentences.chinese: 住宅位于康涅狄格新迦南一块占地47英亩的地块上。

sentences.english: She is located in Haining city of Zhejiang province, covering an area of over 40,000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 公司座落于浙江省海宁市，占地面积4万多平方米。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal itself forms the centerpiece of a 42-acre complex.
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵的中心墓室错综复杂，占地42英亩。

sentences.english: The New Campus of Jianghan University covers an area that is 3 times as big as the old campus.
sentences.chinese: 江汉大学新校区的占地面积是老校区的三倍。

sentences.english: The calender B type, use gas hester, it is saving the power and small floor space be occupy.
sentences.chinese: 型压光机是采用燃气加热，节约能源，占地面积小。

sentences.english: Xingwen Karst Geopark, covering roughly 156 square kilometers, is made up of four scenic areas;
sentences.chinese: 兴文喀斯特地质公园占地约为156平方公里。

sentences.english: In total, the Riviera Coomera facility covers 14 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 里维埃拉高玛拉总部占地面积达到14公顷。

sentences.english: When full, the reservoir will cover an area of over 190 square kilometres.
sentences.chinese: 当水库满的时候，其占地超过190平方公里。

sentences.english: My company is located in Jinshan, Shanghai Chemical Industry Park, covering 61 acres.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位于上海金山化学工业区，占地61余亩。

sentences.english: The accumulated soda waste by the Tianjin Soda Factory only has taken places up to several square kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 仅天津碱厂历年堆积的碱渣占地已达数平方公里。

sentences.english: The company covers an area of about 800 square meters, 50 workers.
sentences.chinese: 本公司占地面积约为800平方米，工人50人。

sentences.english: Opening its embrace to the warm sea breezes, the home covers an area of 1397 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 占地1397平方米的别墅沐浴在温暖的海风中。

sentences.english: S Existing industrial park covers an area of more than 20 acres.
sentences.chinese: 公司现有工业园占地面积20余亩。

sentences.english: It covers an area of 290 hectares，and has halls，pavilions，corridors and bridges almost everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 它占地290公顷，亭台楼阁和回廊小桥比比皆是。

sentences.english: Space required for modern biological waste treatment plants is large.
sentences.chinese: 现代生物废品处理站的占地面积很大。

definition: floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
to be situated/to be located (of a building)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
to be right next to/close neighbor
to be situated/located at (of building)/also written 坐落[zuo4 luo4]
Xinjian county in Nanchang 南昌, Jiangxi
